MetaDescription: Explore RAL colors with hex codes, RGB values, color conversion tools, and side-by-side comparisons. Your complete resource for RAL Classic, Design System Plus, and Effect colors.
WelcomeBody: Your resource for color reference and tools.
AllColorsDesc: Browse the complete collection of RAL Classic, Design System Plus, and Effect colors.
RalClassicDesc: The original 215 RAL colors used worldwide in industry and trade.
RalDesignPlusDesc: 1,825 colors systematically arranged for architects and designers.
RalEffectDesc: 490 metallic and solid colors for special coating effects.
ConverterDesc: Convert RAL colors to HEX, RGB, HSL, and CMYK formats.
CompareDesc: Compare up to 8 RAL colors side by side on different backgrounds.
